forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain, heavy at times early, diminishing to a few showers this afternoon. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. High 53F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 3C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 38F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High around 15C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 59F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 56F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 48F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 6C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 43F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High near 10C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 51F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 38F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 13C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 56F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 39F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 16C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High near 60F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low near 45F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.
